import "./checkout-item.styles.scss" import {React, useContext} from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../../context/cart.context' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem}) => { const {name,price,quantity,imageUrl}= cartItem const {addItemToCart, removeItemFromCart}=useContext(CartContext) return (
{name}
❮
{quantity}
❯
{price}
✕
) } export default CheckoutItem
